Connectivity.title: Connectivity
Connectivity.description: Connecting your Akeneo PIM is an important part of running a successful omnichannel business. That's why with Akeneo PIM Version 6 we've introduced new features and functionality to improve your API and your connection experience.

Productivity.title: Productivity
Productivity.description: Akeneo PIM is designed to help you be more productive and collaborate with more efficieny. That's why with Akeneo PIM Version 6 we've introduced new features and functionality to improve your efficieny with data exportation and distribution, and UI improvements making your PIM even easier to use.
